Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.network

Class Room

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.network.Room
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a room where the player can join as a wainting space. It contains the nicknames of the players in the game and their connections and View.

  • Field Details

    • roomName

      private final java.lang.String roomName

    • numOfPlayers

      private final int numOfPlayers
      roomName is the identifier of a room. It must be different from all rooms.

    • game

      Number of player that the room will host. Max 4

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      true if the game is already started. In that case a room is active.

    • setActive

      public void setActive()

    • setPlayersview

    • getGame

      public GameExt getGame()

    • addConnection

      public void addConnection​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientConnection connection)
      Add a single connection to the room. When a connection is stored it sends a ConnectionMessage to all the players in the room.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      connection -

    • addConnectionWithoutMessage

      private void addConnectionWithoutMessage​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientConnection connection)
      Add a single connection to the room without notify the players.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      connection -

    • disconnectConnection

      public boolean disconnectConnection​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Removes a player from the active connection and stores it to disconnected players list and sets her View Offline. If theres no more active players it clears the room. It notify all the players about the disconnection.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      Returns:
      true if theres no more active players in the room, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it doesnt find the player in the connection list.

    • reconnectConnection

      public void reconnectConnection​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientConnection connection)
      Reconnect a player to a room, setting the new SocketClientConnection and settings her View to ON. Notify all the player about the reconnections.
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      connection -
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the player is not in the disconnect player list.

    • getRoomName

      public java.lang.String getRoomName()

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()

    • getConnections

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​ClientConnection> getConnections()

    • findPlayer

      public boolean findPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:
      true if the player name is found in the active connections list.

    • findDisconnectedPlayer

      public boolean findDisconnectedPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:
      true if the player name is found in the disconnected connections list.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Returns:
      true if the number of connections matches the number of player that the room was waiting.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Methods that takes advantage on default java garbage collector. It sets the game and controller to null, clears the connection player list and set the room to not active.
